# ovirt_vnic_profile (Data Source)

Returns the ID of the given vnic_profile.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) oVirt name of the vnic profile.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) oVirt ID of the vnic profile.
